overview: The lead singer of Slipknot joins the surreal review of the surreal movie. It's not like a film like this deserved anything normal.  Nostalgia Critic takes a look at Pink Floyd's The Wall.  Pink Floyd â€“ The Wall is a 1982 British live-action/animated musical drama film directed by Alan Parker with animated segments by Gerald Scarfe, and is based on the 1979 Pink Floyd album of the same name.
title: Nostalgia Critic The Wall
